attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Munir Hussain and his brother Tokeer have been jailed for attacking an intruder who tied up Munir and his family and threatened to kill them.
The Judge said in court that the Hussain family had been "subject to a “serious and wicked offence" before sentencing Munir to 30 months in prison.When will the law in this country look after the victim rather than the criminals?

rejection.details: Individual legal cases are a matter for direct communication with the Home Office.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
